The required paperwork was not available for review at time of inspection. Without this paperwork APHIS officials cannot
verify compliance with The Act. Each exhibitor shall, during business hours, allow APHIS officials to examine records
required to be kept by the Act and the regulations in this part.
To be corrected by March 14, 2025

There was approximately 2 feet of corrugated sheet metal along a back wall in the goat barn where the bottom portion
was rusted and there were gaps with jagged ends present. Areas of disrepair in animal housing areas may cause harm
and/ or injure an animal.
The indoor and outdoor housing facilities shall be structurally sound and shall be maintained in good repair to protect the
animals from injury and to contain the animals.
To be corrected by March 14, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
